flawed_nl_solution:
On Monday, 80 - 20 = <<80-20=60>>60 people attended the game.
On Wednesday, 60 + 50 = <<60+50=110>>110 people attended the game.
On Friday, 80 + 60 = <<80+60=410>>410 people attended the game.
A total of 80 + 60 + 110 + 410 = <<80+60+110+410=660>>660 people attended the games in a week.
Therefore, 660 - 350 = <<660-350=310>>310 people more attended the games than they had expected.
#### 310

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 140, not 410. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
